body: Writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like Tailwind and React.
Adding dynamic elements to improve the user experience using CSS animations, JavaScript, or libraries like Framer motion.
Creating mobile-friendly websites that work seamlessly across all devices.
Creating visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces that enhance the overall user experience.
Enhancing user satisfaction by improving the usability, accessibility, and pleasure provided in the interaction with the product.
Developing interactive prototypes and wireframes to visualize and test design concepts.
